definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

sentences.english: He was anointed princeps ; the Roman empire is said to begin with his accession.
sentences.chinese: 他被奉爲元首，羅馬帝國據說就是從他即位開始。

sentences.english: His name was Charlemagne-Charles Magnus, the Great-emperor of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 他就是神聖羅馬帝國皇帝查理曼大帝。

sentences.english: The influence of both Roman and Byzantine traditions is evident in the architecture of the Romanesque period.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬式建築顯然受到了羅馬帝國和拜占庭傳統的影響。

sentences.english: By 180 AD, the Roman Empire began to disintegrate.
sentences.chinese: 到了公元180年，羅馬帝國開始瓦解。

sentences.english: For over three hundred years the rulers of the Roman Empire worshipped the god Mithras .
sentences.chinese: 三百多年以來，羅馬帝國的統治者崇拜密特拉神。

sentences.english: The sea battle of Actium decides the fate of the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 亞克興海戰決定了羅馬帝國的命運。

sentences.english: Roman empire, Brirish Empire all declined.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬帝國，大英帝國都衰落了。

sentences.english: How was the Roman Empire cut in half?
sentences.chinese: 羅馬帝國師如何一分爲二的？

sentences.english: Christianity, in turn, helped spread the codex throughout the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，基督教也推動了手抄本在羅馬帝國內的傳播。

sentences.english: The fall of the West Rome Empire marked the beginning of feudalism in Eurpoe.
sentences.chinese: 西羅馬帝國的滅亡標誌着歐洲封建制度的開始。

sentences.english: His history of the ancient Roman Empire is a monument of learning and deep study.
sentences.chinese: 他所寫的古羅馬帝國史是學術研究的不朽作品。

sentences.english: They applied this principle all across the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他們在整個羅馬帝國中應用這一原則。

sentences.english: Septimius Severus was an emperor at turning point in the Roman imperial history.
sentences.chinese: 塞維魯爲羅馬帝國曆史上承上啓下的皇帝。

sentences.english: It was the capital of the Western Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 它曾爲西羅馬帝國的首都。

sentences.english: Augustus and the formation of empire.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都及羅馬帝國的形成。

sentences.english: It dates to the Roman period just after the time of Jesus, said Doron Ben-Ami, who directed the dig.
sentences.chinese: 由它可追溯到緊隨耶穌時代之後的羅馬帝國時期。
